import React from 'react' function TopHeader() { const officeSelect = (e) => { let value = e.target.value console.log(value); const secSection = document.getElementById('secSection') if (!value == "") { secSection.style.display = 'flex' console.log('o'); }else{ secSection.style.display = 'none' } } return ( <>

) } export default TopHeader
